name: tables-components
description: Practicando algunas tablas hecha con react

scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] browser/main.js -o assets/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] browser/main.js -o assets/js/bundle.js -dv
scripts.start-dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run watch-js & http-server .

author: sebastian duque restrepo <sebas_tian_95@hotmail.com>
